content: Test core commands: /analyze, /review, /troubleshoot with basic flags
Experiment with 2-3 personas (architect, security, frontend) on test project
Document initial command effectiveness and usage patterns
Integrate SuperClaude commands into existing development workflow
Test creative command combinations and flag interactions
Evaluate MCP server requirements and potential setup
Research and test token optimization features (--uc mode)
Develop custom workflows for specific development scenarios
Identify opportunities to contribute back to SuperClaude project
Create comprehensive markdown document with all findings and future evaluation strategies
